title: UNIX Family Tree (1969-2025)
description: Interactive inheritance network diagram showing how UNIX evolved into BSD, System V, and GNU/Linux branches over time
creator: Learning Linux Course
subject: Operating Systems History
audience: Students learning Linux and operating systems
learningObjectives: Visualize how UNIX evolved into different branches over time
Identify BSD and System V as major UNIX derivatives
Understand how Linux emerged as a separate but compatible system
Recognize the relationship between GNU tools and the Linux kernel
